text: École Supérieure d'Électricité, commonly known as Supélec, is a French university in electric energy and information sciences. L’Ecole Centrale Paris et Supélec annoncent leur alliance stratégique Founded in 1894 and initially located in the 15th district of Paris, it was moved to Gif-sur-Yvette in 1975. After that, two more campuses were established in Rennes in 1972 and Metz in 1985. It is a member of the Conférence des Grandes Écoles. SUPELEC ==Notable Alumni== * Hervé Laborne, former head of the École spéciale de mécanique et électricité. == References == == Other websites == * Official website in English Category:Technical colleges and universities in France Category:1894 establishments in Europe Category:1890s establishments in France
title: Supélec
